body.name: L Shaped Gaming Desk Reversible Computer Desk with Pegboard & Shelves & Drawers, Gaming Desk with Power Outlet & LED Strip & Monitor Stand & Mobile CPU Stand, Corner deck for Home Office Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 34 mins
features: [Having 2 Desks in 1]Offer dual work-spaces to separate work/study from play. Providing a solution for multifunctional home office needs, you can flexibly designate space for both work and recreational activities, allowing you to stay focused during work and seamlessly transition into a dedicated play or leisure space.

[LED Light] Immerse yourself in a world of vibrant colors! The DOMICON Gaming Desk offers personification with RGB lighting. 7 main colors and up to 20 dynamic lighting modes seamlessly adapt to your surroundings. Life is all about rituals, you can curate an immersive space with our desk!

[Built-in Power Outlets] Our gaming table is equipped with 4 AC outlets and 2 USB charging ports to eliminate cord clutter and power up to 6 devices simultaneously, providing unparalleled convenience for gamer and users. Rated power: 1500W; AC power outlet: 120V/12A; USB port: 5V 2.2A

[Different Shapes Fit Various Spaces]The reversible 66.5-inch corner table or 94.5-inch long desk fits perfectly in different corners of the room. The L-shaped game table can be transformed into a long table for two to play games with your friends if needed. The stylish and timeless look can be matched with all home decor styles.

[Unique 3-tier cabinet]Struggling with a mountain of study or work materials? Our exclusive 3-tier cabinet design with table-side storage bag provide more storage space than others. The bottom tier boasts hanging bars for legal, letter, hanging folders, great to keep your files, documents and other office supplies organized. It also has a oversized storage pocket on the side.

[Top Shelf with Pegboard]Our innovative computer desk has top shelf with pegboard which not just a storage solution, but a clever stylish addition. Escalate your workspace, amplify your room's personality – it's time to redefine your surroundings!

[Mobile CPU Rolling Stand & Monitor Stand]Effortless Mobility & Display Ergonomic! Our gaming desk features a mobile CPU stand with 360-degree rotating casters for easy movement and lockable steel pipes to secure the CPU bracket. It is convenient to place and easy to clean the floor. The monitor stand boasts a spacious 14.6 x 9.3 inches durable shelf, accommodating most flat screen displays, laptops and printers.

reviews.reviewerName: This gaming desk has completely transformed my gaming setup! Its sleek design and ample space have not only enhanced my gaming experience but also added a stylish touch to my room. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for both functionality and aesthetics in their gaming workspace!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good fitness and convenience
reviews.reviewText: This L shaped gaming desk has completely transformed my gaming setup! Its sleek design and ample space have not only enhanced my gaming experience but also added a stylish touch to my room. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for both functionality and aesthetics in their gaming workspace!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice quality, durable materials, easy to assemble highly recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome desk with so many options
reviews.reviewText: So I picked this desk up for my oldest son. He’s an online gamer and has been “working” with a much smaller desk. I’ll start with the assembly. It wasn’t difficult to put together and took I’d say about an hour total. There’s a lot of pieces and hardware to keep organized so keep that in mind wherever you build it. We thought about placement and being modular, how he wanted to configure it. That in itself is a plus since you have options. We decided on the L-shape configuration and once assembled, I was pretty happy with how solid it felt. Even the accessories are either bolted in place or have solid rubber feet to keep them in place. The next big plus are all of the accessories you get. The drawers are decent, nothing really special. But you also get the added shelving and bin as well as the option to use the perforated board with hooks for added accessories. The bottom line is, this desk offers plenty of options for you to set it up as custom as you’d like. The only thing I thought might be better thought out is the built in power strip. While very nice to have, I personally would prefer it hidden under the desktop rather than on top. To me, under mounted power strips are easier to keep your wiring clean and tucked out of the way. Overall though, I’m very happy with this desk and my son was super thrilled to have a larger and modular gaming space to enjoy. I hope this helps you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid desk, very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This desk is well made. Its metal frame makes it very sturdy compared to other desks made of particle board with cam locks. This one is all metal (except the tops) secured with bolts. It should hold up for years even if it has to be moved.I really like the care they took to put numbers or letter on each part and bolt, so you can be sure you have all the parts before your start assembly. The steps are easy to follow as they have a drawing for each step with the part number and count. I have never put complicated furniture together that was so well planned out.The desk is very light weight for its size, as it uses fabric drawers and aluminum supports, but it still feels solid.My only complaint is that the LED light strip included was stick on, and the sticky surface was not sticky enough to keep the end connected to the power from slowly pulling down. I added a cable tie at that end to solve the problem, but I think they should have provided a better solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy Build L Shaped Gaming Desk with Pegboard
reviews.reviewText: I am using this desk in my own personal use in my man cave for handling all my technology adventures. While for me the initial cost seemed a bit steep, the investment is undoubtedly worthwhile once you experience the sturdy build, well-thought-out design, and the myriad of features this gaming desk offers. I like the sturdiness and well-designed structure of the desk are evident in every detail. The inclusion of shelves, drawers, and a mobile CPU stand offers abundant storage options, ensuring a clutter-free and efficient environment. One standout feature is the thoughtful addition of a pegboard with hanging hooks and headsets. I would highly recommend the gaming desk to those who value quality and functionality in their gaming setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY nice gaming or home office desk!!!
reviews.reviewText: I really love this gaming desk! I got it to use as my home office and it greatly exceeded my expectations. The design is genius and the quality is more than good, it's fantastic. I've assembled a lot of items in my day and when assembling this desk I was amazed at the engineering. It's incredibly sturdy, solid, and durable. Every hole, bolt, screw, etc. went together perfectly! It has table mounted plugs and USB ports and features a nice RGB LED strip. And the instructions were actually easy to follow and correct, which is a rarity anymore. It takes a while to assemble alone, but it's easy. This desk deserves 6 stars, I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this L shaped desk for my son for his studying and for his games. it offers a perfect blend of functionality and style and it is perfectly fit in his room.it is also easy to installation . The black finish adds a sleek touch, making it an ideal addition to my home office.The size and height are very suitable, and I am very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice L Shaped Desk.
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice desk, perfect for a student, or an adult. It is quite easy to put together compared to some of the other desks I have assembled. It is great in that it has a pegboard/shelving unit that lights up! It also has decent drawers where you can put away your projects and keep your desk nice and tidy. I would highly recommend this desk!
